00058 typedef enum
00059 {
00061   ZDO_SUCCESS_STATUS                         = 0x00,
00063   ZDO_INVALID_PARAMETERS_STATUS              = 0x01,
00064   ZDO_RESPONSE_WAIT_TIMEOUT_STATUS           = 0x02,
00066   ZDO_BUSY_STATUS                            = 0x04,
00068   ZDO_NO_NETWORKS_STATUS                     = 0x05,
00070   ZDO_EXTPANID_ALREADY_EXIST_STATUS          = 0x06,
00072   ZDO_FAIL_STATUS                            = 0x07,
00073   ZDO_AUTHENTICATION_SUCCESS_STATUS          = 0x08,
00074   ZDO_AUTHENTICATION_FAIL_STATUS             = 0x09,
00075   ZDO_SECURITY_SUCCESS_STATUS                = 0x0A,
00076   ZDO_SECURITY_FAIL_STATUS                   = 0x0B,
00077   ZDO_SECURITY_NOT_SUPPORTED_STATUS          = 0x0C,
00079   //request the confirmation with this status is issued if the timeout for
00080   //ZDP response has exceeded and the stack has ceased waiting
00081   ZDO_CMD_COMPLETED_STATUS                   = 0x0D,
00082   ZDO_KEY_ESTABLISHMENT_NOT_SUPPORTED_STATUS = 0x0E,
00083 
00085   ZDO_NO_KEY_PAIR_DESCRIPTOR_STATUS = 0x50,

00108   ZDO_NOT_SUPPORTED_STATUS          = 0x84,

00114   ZDO_NO_ENTRY_STATUS               = 0x88,
00116   ZDO_NO_DESCRIPTOR_STATUS          = 0x89,

00122   ZDO_TABLE_FULL_STATUS             = 0x8C,
00124   ZDO_NOT_AUTHORIZED_STATUS         = 0x8D,
00126   ZDO_NWK_UPDATE_STATUS             = 0x8E,
00128   ZDO_NETWORK_STARTED_STATUS        = 0x8F,

00158 enum

00194   RECOVER_SOURCE_BIND_CLID     = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x002A),

01108 /**************************************************************************/
01111 typedef struct PACK
01112 {
01113   uint8_t seqNum; 
01114   // user part
01115   uint8_t status; 
01116   union PACK
01117   {
01118     ZDO_NwkAddrResp_t               nwkAddrResp; 
01119     ZDO_IeeeAddrResp_t              ieeeAddrResp; 
01120     ZDO_NodeDescResp_t              nodeDescResp; 
01121     ZDO_PowerDescResp_t             powerDescResp; 
01122     ZDO_SimpleDescResp_t            simpleDescResp; 
01123     ZDO_ComplexDescResp_t           complexDescResp; 
01124     ZDO_UserDescResp_t              userDescResp; 
01125     ZDO_ActiveEPResp_t              activeEPResp; 
01126     ZDO_UserDescConfResp_t          userDescConfResp; 
01127     ZDO_SystemServerDiscoveryResp_t systemServerDiscoveryResp; 
01128 #ifdef _BINDING_
01129     ZDO_MatchDescResp_t             matchDescResp;      
01130     ZDO_BindResp_t                  bindResp;           
01131     ZDO_UnbindResp_t                unbindResp;         
01132 #ifdef _CERTIFICATION_
01133     ZDO_MgmtBindResp_t              mgmtBindResp;       
01134 #endif // _CERTIFICATION_
01135 #endif // _BINDING_
01136     ZDO_MgmtNwkUpdateNotf_t         mgmtNwkUpdateNotf; 
01137     ZDO_MgmtLqiResp_t               mgmtLqiResp; 
01138   };
01139 } ZDO_ZdpRespFrame_t;
01140 
01141 /**************************************************************************/
01144 typedef struct PACK
01145 {
01146   uint8_t seqNum; 
01147   // user part
01148   union PACK
01149   {
01150     ZDO_NwkAddrReq_t               nwkAddrReq; 
01151     ZDO_IeeeAddrReq_t              ieeeAddrReq; 
01152     ZDO_NodeDescReq_t              nodeDescReq; 
01153     ZDO_PowerDescReq_t             powerDescReq; 
01154     ZDO_SimpleDescReq_t            simpleDescReq; 
01155     ZDO_DeviceAnnceReq_t           deviceAnnce; 
01156     ZDO_ActiveEPReq_t              activeEPReq; 
01157     ZDO_ComplexDescReq_t           complexDescReq; 
01158     ZDO_UserDescReq_t              userDescReq; 
01159     ZDO_UserDescSetReq_t           userDescSetReq; 
01160     ZDO_SystemServerDiscoveryReq_t systemServerDiscoveryReq; 
01161 #ifdef _BINDING_
01162     ZDO_MatchDescReq_t             matchDescReq;      
01163     ZDO_EndDeviceBindReq_t         endDeviceBindReq;  
01164     ZDO_BindReq_t                  bindReq;           
01165     ZDO_UnbindReq_t                unbindReq;         
01166 #ifdef _CERTIFICATION_
01167     ZDO_MgmtBindReq_t              mgmtBindReq;       
01168 #endif // _CERTIFICATION_
01169 #endif // _BINDING_
01170     ZDO_MgmtLeaveReq_t             mgmtLeaveReq; 
01171     ZDO_MgmtPermitJoiningReq_t     mgmtPermitJoiningReq; 
01172     ZDO_MgmtNwkUpdateReq_t         mgmtNwkUpdateReq; 
01173     ZDO_MgmtNwkUpdateNotf_t        mgmtNwkUpdateNotf; 
01174     ZDO_MgmtLqiReq_t               mgmtLqiReq; 
01175   };
01176 } ZDO_ZdpReqFrame_t;
01177 
01178 /**************************************************************************/
01181 typedef struct PACK
01182 {
01183   TOP_GUARD
01184   uint8_t header[APS_ASDU_OFFSET];
01185   union PACK
01186   {
01187     ZDO_ZdpRespFrame_t respPayload;
01188     ZDO_ZdpReqFrame_t  reqPayload;
01189   };
01190 #if (APS_AFFIX_LENGTH - APS_ASDU_OFFSET)
01191   uint8_t footer[APS_AFFIX_LENGTH - APS_ASDU_OFFSET];
01192 #endif
01193   BOTTOM_GUARD
01194 } ZDO_ZdpFrame_t;
01195 END_PACK
01196 
01197 /**************************************************************************/
01200 typedef struct
01201 {
01202   AddrMode_t     srcAddrMode; 
01203   union
01204   {
01205     ShortAddr_t  srcNwkAddr; 
01206     ExtAddr_t    srcExtAddr; 
01207   };
01208   ZDO_ZdpRespFrame_t respPayload; 
01209 } ZDO_ZdpResp_t;
01210 
01211 /**************************************************************************/
01214 typedef struct
01215 {
01216   //\cond internal
01217   struct
01218   {
01219     void *next;
01220     uint16_t ttl;
01221     uint8_t state;
01222     uint8_t seqNumCopy;  //used to prevent seq number encription
01223   } service;
01224   //\endcond
01225 
01226   // Address fields
01227   uint16_t   reqCluster; 
01228   AddrMode_t dstAddrMode; 
01229   union
01230   {
01231     ShortAddr_t  dstNwkAddr; 
01232     ExtAddr_t    dstExtAddr;
01233   };
01234   // ZDP frame for sending out
01235   ZDO_ZdpFrame_t req; 
01236   //Callback and Response
01237   void (*ZDO_ZdpResp)(ZDO_ZdpResp_t *zdpResp); 
01238   ZDO_ZdpResp_t resp; 
01239 } ZDO_ZdpReq_t;
01240 
01241 /**************************************************************************/
01244 typedef struct
01245 {
01246   ShortAddr_t  nodeAddr; 
01247   uint8_t      lqi; 
01249   int8_t      rssi; 
01253 } ZDO_GetLqiRssi_t;
